supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-15 (in mm), (1) 20 x 56, (A) 1 lines, bottom (?) margin, (B) traces, (2) 40 x 50, (A) 4 lines, left margin, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (3) 47 x 40, (A) 6 lines, no margin, (B) 3 lines, right margin, (4) 52 x 42, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (5) 50 x 50, (A) 3 lines, top right margins, (B) blank, (6) 42 x 53, (A) 2 lines, bottom right margins, (B) blank, (7) 36 x 39, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 41 x 37, (A) 3 lines, top margin, (B) traces of 2 lines, (9) 34 x 38, (A) 3 lines, right margin (?), (B) blank, (10) 26 x 21, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) traces of 2 lines, (11) 78 x 46, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 7 lines, no margins, (12) 84 x 25, (A) 8 lines, left margins, (B) 12 lines, no margins, (13) 100 x 17, (A) 9 lines, no margins, (B) 12 lines, no margins, (14) 110 x 38, (A) 10 lines, top margin, (B) 9 lines, top right margins, (15) 102 x 20, (A) 3 texts, text i: 3 lines, upside down, right margin (?), text ii: 5 lines, left margin, text iii: 2 lines, upside down, no margins, (B) 14 lines, right margin
